title: Chairman Ben S. Bernake's Speech on Rebalancing the Global Recovery
content: Figure 9  EME Reserves    0    1000    2000    3000    4000    5000    6000  2000 2001 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010  Billions of U.S. dollars  Monthly     Note: Emerging market economies (EMEs) consist of Brazil, Chile, China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, Mexico, the Philippines, Poland, South Korea, Taiwan, Thailand, Turkey, Singapore, and Russia.    Source: Bloomberg; country sources via Haver.
